thread.title: The Chase viewers 'fall in love' with contestant and are furious when she’s beaten
thread.title_full: The Chase viewers 'fall in love' with contestant and are furious when she’s beaten

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: The Chase viewers 'fall in love' with contestant and are furious when she’s beaten
text:
TV The Chase viewers 'fall in love' with contestant and are furious when she’s beaten Fans of the show were quite taken with Charlotte, and were sad to see her eliminated from the quiz show Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Viewers of The Chase were left swooning over a contestant on the quiz show on Friday - and even made marriage proposals to her on social media. 
Fans were quite taken with sports student Charlotte, 18, who racked up £3,000 before taking on The Governess, Anne Hegerty. 
As soon as she appeared on screen, Twitter went wild over the clever - and pretty - contestant. 
“That Charlotte is stunning,” wrote one, while another commented, “Think I’m in love with Charlotte on the chase.” 
"Watching #TheChase and may have developed a crush on Charlotte... Looks like I'm stuck on the sofa for a further 20 minutes..." gushed another fan. Charlotte won over viewers on The Chase (Photo: ITV) Marriage proposals came flooding in (Photo: ITV) Sadly she was defeated by The Governess (Photo: ITV) Read More 
Another fan was so smitten, he decided Charlotte was the only girl for him: “Charlotte from the Chase today was the cutest thing I've ever seen. Someone please point her in my direction so I can propose.” Bradley Walsh and The Governess (Photo: ITV) 
But Charlotte's new-found fans were horrified when she was beaten by The Chaser and left the show after getting a question about Greek words wrong. 
One fan had had enough and ditched ITV after she bowed out, tweeting, “Charlotte! Noooo! Am changing the channel now. What is life?” Like us on Facebook
